mapper.insert: INSERT INTO visitor(vsdate,vscount) VALUES (date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE vscount = vscount + 1
mapper.select: SELECT vscount from visitor where vsdate = DATE_FORMAT(#{vsdate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
